page.title: 04Clubs in Exbourne
page.content: {Friday club}is held in the evening Children from other villages come too.Clive,Tom and Barry run it.They play games on the field or have activities in the Hall. {Bingo-}is held in the village Hall on the first Saturday of each month.The village post master and his wife organize it.At Christmas and Easter the prizes are chickens,but normally it is money.The profits go to the Hall Fund. {Jumble Sales}Are held on a Saturday afternoon.Different organizations run them in the Hall. {Help The Aged club-}every Tuesday afternoon in the Hall.The old people do crafts and chat. {W.I.}-meets monthly in the Hall.Some members come from other villages.
